text:
Come and work at the circus themed offices of Angel Solutions Ltd as a Software Developer in Liverpool.

Full job description and details on how to apply are here

http://www.angelsolutions.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/S...

Skills: ASP.NET, jQuery, SQL Server, HTML, CSS and MVC

Perks > Flexible working hours > Your birthday off > Competitive salary with monthly wage increase > Monthly Innovation Days (work on what you want) > Ongoing training & qualifications > Generous leave allowance > Creative office space > Regular charity days
